CHANGE LOG

==========

0.0.1 (23/01/2021)
-------------------
- Inititial Release

0.0.2 (24/01/2021)
-------------------
- Added functions for encoding/decoding the RailFence/Zig-Zag cipher

0.0.3 (24/01/2021)
-------------------
- Added functions for encoding/decoding text in octal

0.1.0 (24/01/2021)
-------------------
- Fixed Bugs
- Added functions for encoding/decoding text in ascii.
